resources.string:
This is a simple widget that can display CHIPS (Chips) exchange rates from Cryptopia.
 Put this widget on your desktop and adjust size. Rates will updates automatically every 30 minutes, if you want to update widget's info now - simply
 click on current rate, info will be updated immediatelly. Also you can place on the same desktop two or more widgets, for example, to see previous and
 current rates.


 I'm not a professional Android developer and this is my first experience in creating widgets for Android. So, a lot a work ahead. But this very early
 alpha version of widget is works and looks nice. You can support the developement by transfer some coins to my CHIPS wallet:

Thx in advance.

 Useful links

 - Chips thread on Bitcoin Talk
 - Block Explorer
 - Exchange
